globalReport.name: Global report
description: the Internet Health Report helps to monitor network conditions.
the Global report helps to catch a glimpse of status of the whole network using charts.

asInterdependence.title: AS interdependence
description: Shows connectivity between networks (a.k.a AS) using {asPaper}AS hegemony{close} metric.

delayAndForwarding.title: delay and forwarding
description: shows delay changes and forwarding anomalies to detect network malfunctions.

disco.title: network disconnection
description: show the average of severity levels of network disconnection.
